name: Magma Jump League
description:
Welcome to Gamma Island

The land you tread on is sacred, it has been blessed by the island's namesake: Gamma Volcano.
The lava from this volcano has a special quality, once cool enough to tread upon, it becomes extremely bouncy.
All visitors must participate in the ancient ritual known as The Magma Jump League. Remain the last person alive within the bouncy caldera of Gamma Volcano.
